title: Champion mastery tokens
body:
I just finished a game where I played soraka (which i own and am level 5 with) and I scored an S and didn't get champion mastery level 6 tokens. I don't have any bans or punishments on my account because I got a key fragment 2 games before that one. What's causing this?
This isn't the first time it happened, the same issue happened to me about a week (or two) ago with caitlyn.

Thanks for the help. Keep the good work.

replies.body:
*ZombieMaster* made a great analysis of this situation. As referenced in our [Champion Mastery Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide#h1q5):

>You can only earn Mastery 6 and 7 tokens in Summoner's Rift normal and ranked games.

Let me know if you have any questions.
didn't know that ... i was playing an aram game. Thanks :)

What game mode were you playing? You are only able to earn mastery tokens when playing normal or ranked Summoner's Rift, so if you were playing ARAM, Twisted Treeline, or any of the rotating game modes, that is why you did not receive the mastery token.
It was aram ... I thought the rules for key fragments are the same as those for the mastery level 6/7 tokens (except for the fact that you must win to earn a key fragment) Thanks.
